tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GMOCropYields (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(50),
  yield_in_tons FLOAT,
  growing_season INT,
  GMO_affected BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE gmo_impact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    season_id INT,
    impact_description TEXT,
    impact_rating INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crop_data(crop_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (season_id) REFERENCES growing_season(season_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crops (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(255),
  planting_date DATE,
  harvest_date DATE,
  yield DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE farmers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  farmer_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE seasons (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  season_year INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE gmo_effects (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id INT,
  season_id INT,
  effect_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE gmo_crops (
    gmo_crop_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    gmo_id INT NOT NULL,
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    season_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (gmo_id) REFERENCES gmos(gmo_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(crop_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (season_id) REFERENCES growing_seasons(season_id)
);
